column4: an unknown man climbed an electricity pylon in the village of Trapeang
column5: Sre Ambel Commune. The district chief
column7: ordered the power supply be switched off to avoid the man shocking himself.------However the man refused to come down and nobody was willing to risk themselves to take him. Then at 7:30 pm
column8: he stripped naked and hanged himself from the cables.------https://www.postnews.com.kh/local/397100
